question: Justice Ramalingam Sudhakar was recently appointed as the Chief Justice of ________ High Court by the President of India.
explanation: Justice Ramalingam Sudhakar was sworn-in as the Chief Justice of the High Court of Manipur. The acting Governor of Manipur Jagdish Mukhi administered the oath of office to Justice Ramalingam Sudhakar. Justice Ramalingam Sudhakar was appointed as Chief Justice of Manipur High Court by the President of India.
